casebody.data:
In the Matter of M.E.
appealed by Mother-Respondent. No. 68P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Duncan McCormick, Lillington, for Mother. Natarlin Best, for Edgecombe County DSS. Robert Dale Pitt, Pinetops, for Guardian ad Litem. Wayne Boyette, Tarboro, for Father. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 638 S.E.2d 513 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of February 2007 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of May 2007."
